headline.main: GERMANS CLOSE IN; Wedge North of Capital Is Driven Deeper in Sweep, by Tanks

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 24 -- The battle for Moscow continues with undi -minished fury, according to German reports released here today, and for the first time in many weeks the High Command communique mentions a place name in the Moscow sector, that of Solnechnogorsk, a village thirty-one miles northwest of the Soviet capital.
abstract: Germans claim Solnechnogorsk taken in tank attack, Moscow drive; USSR admits Moscow threat; Germans reptd paying for gains with heavy losses; lull in Crimean drive seen; Germans press air attacks, Moscow sector; map
